meanings.definition: Serving to make something look more attractive or festive.
meanings.sent1: The decorative flowers on the table added a festive touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: She bought decorative lights to make her house look more attractive during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The decorative cupcakes were so pretty that they almost looked too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as decorative as a bouquet of flowers, brightening up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The decorative curtains fluttered in the breeze, creating a charming atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Used to make something look more attractive or festive.
meanings.sent1: The decorative ribbons on the gift made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent2: The decorative candles illuminated the room with a warm and inviting glow.
meanings.sent3: The decorative balloons added a fun and colorful touch to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as decorative as a string of twinkling lights, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The decorative wreath on the door welcomed guests with a festive spirit.

meanings.definition: Intended to make something look more attractive or festive.
meanings.sent1: The decorative ornaments on the tree sparkled in the soft light of the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a decorative necklace that shimmered under the evening lights.
meanings.sent3: The decorative banners fluttered in the wind, creating a playful scene.
meanings.sent4: His words were as decorative as a beautifully wrapped gift, making her smile.
meanings.sent5: The decorative tablecloth transformed the plain table into a festive dining area.
